website_summaries.verdict: A 6-pack of classic Avengers heroes is a fantastic gift, as it includes a large chunk of the legendary superhero team in one convenient set.
pros: Includes 6 heroic Avengers: Captain America, Black Panther, Ant-Man, Falcon, Iron Man, and Hawkeye
cons: Doesn’t include any villains to fight

customer_reviews.title: Heads come off easily
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t until I was wrapping this gift for my son that I realized Falcon was missing his head, which I found in the packaging. Days later Ant-man’s head fell off too. I’m sure it’s just a matter of time before they are all headless. My son is not a rough kid. Heads won’t go back on. Very disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!!
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same quality as the older playschool character. The head comes off. I am going to have to super glue the heads on so he does not lose them. I would return however he was so happy to get them. It is going to suck that their head will not turn after I glue them. For price I paid I would expect more. They were kind of pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for super hero fans!
customer_reviews.text: These are such a great choice for Super Hero lovers! my two boys, ages 7 and 4, have been playing with them constantly. They fit well with both Playskool and Imaginext sets, which I love, because we have a mix of both. They are really durable even after hours of rough little-boy play.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your little hero
customer_reviews.text: My five year old loves these. He plays with them for hours. We have Imaginex and Playskool toys and they work perfect with each other. With all these cool Marvel Heros, I will often find my older kids playing with them too. If your little one loves Marvel super heros, this set is sure to impress.
customer_reviews.author: Rhett Barnard

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this set as it has all of my sons’ favorite characters. However, the Hawkeye in the package came missing a head. It was nowhere to be found in the package to even glue on, and I sadly will not be able to gift this to them for their birthday. I also won’t be able to return it as we are quarantined due to the corona virus. All of the other characters look great. Be careful!
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for young children fingers
customer_reviews.text: My three-year-old grandson loves to hold small items and my grandson is in that stage where he likes to carry figures everywhere. It’s a perfect size and he loves superheroes, great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Skate62

customer_reviews.title: Cute Figures
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these little figures, and he loves Marvel as well. There is only 6 small figures. You would think this would cost you at the most $15. They are cute, and you can tell who each figure is.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Fasy

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: 4 out of 6 broke the first day. My 4 year old completely took them apart. Choking hazard for little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Kishinevsky

customer_reviews.title: Mini Marvels
customer_reviews.text: My two and five year olds love these. The grandparents bought them Captain America and Iron Man mech suits, and these figures fit inside. I find them nicely detailed and they are perfect for small hands.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving it 4 stars simply because I prefer the imaginex. These look a little cheaper madex but my kid still played with them!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Swalls

customer_reviews.title: Not  worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These are not worth your money I received my 2.5 figures in the mail as soon as I took them out of the package one of my little guy’s head was not attached
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: Good set!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves and collects these figures (and will probably outgrow them soon) and still plays with them. They're durable and I'm even considering saving them for his children some day...this set has characters most kids will like!
customer_reviews.author: Aveline

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fun
customer_reviews.text: The whole Playskool Heroes line of toys is very enjoyable, even if they do have weirdly large hands compared to the similar Fisher-Price line. My kids love these and play with them all the time (my kids are three and six). They're sturdy and cute - what more do you need?
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca V.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect figurines for my 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect figurines for my 3 year old! Imaginext products are so great for younger kids because they do not have pieces that come off like other figurines which are small enough to swallow. My sone has not stopped playing with these.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Quality issues.
customer_reviews.text: Falcon’s faceshield keeps coming off and getting lost. Otherwise it’s a neat set that our 3 year old loves.
customer_reviews.author: mcnini_77

customer_reviews.title: Tough Toys for Tough Boys
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for little boys that love superheroes. My son asked for these for his 4th birthday. He loves playing with them and they seem indestructible. He is rough on toys and so far, 6 weeks later, they still look like new.
customer_reviews.author: BDavis73

customer_reviews.title: Mini Super Heros!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to go with another action play set. They are awesome - durable and my 3 year old grandson LOVES them!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Fun avengers set
customer_reviews.text: Really cool set. My boys love these little figures. Perfect size for toddler hands and fun to play with. They are a bit pricey unless you can grab on sale.
customer_reviews.author: LL Ham

customer_reviews.title: Happy kid, happy mom
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves his action figures. He’s been playing with them all day. Definitely worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: 5 out of 6 super heroes arrived intact.
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted to advise that 5 out of the 6 super heros were great. But the Falcon super hero arrived with his head off. Had to super glue. Head is on but doesn't move.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great action figures
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old grandson loves these smaller action figures better than the larger ones.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: My son go 2 toys
customer_reviews.text: These little toys are the best,my 3 year old take them everywhere including the bathtub 🛁.I wish it was a little Cheaper but I’ll keep watching out for the price to reorder it because he loss two(2) while we was out.Black panther & captain America are his favorite
customer_reviews.author: Kula

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy. All heads and hands fall off in days.
customer_reviews.text: Broke in less than a week. All the hands and heads fell off. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: jessica c

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves them
customer_reviews.text: They were a little smaller than expected but grandson loved them.
customer_reviews.author: N. Rainock

customer_reviews.title: More for a smaller kid
customer_reviews.text: More for a smaller kid, we’re very small, was expecting bigger figurines
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Son loves them!
customer_reviews.text: fun for little kids! he takes one or two with him everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Superhero Minifigures!
customer_reviews.text: I love these, great add-ons to my superhero and supervillain Imaginext collection.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica S.

customer_reviews.title: Great little figurines
customer_reviews.text: We bought these so our 2yo wouldn't feel left out when we gave our 4yo 12inch Marvel action figures. These are awesome! I have caught my husband playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany A. White

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: A little bit pricey for what you get but my nephew loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Great mini action figures
customer_reviews.text: Great mini action figures! Pretty durable and the arms move up and down.
customer_reviews.author: E.T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a 4 Year Old
customer_reviews.text: This toy was a perfect birthday gift for a 4 year old child. The action figures are rather small but fit perfectly into their hands and looked exactly as pictured. All of the kids at the party were playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: n lunn

customer_reviews.title: Don’t know
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know I gave it to my grandsons as a gift

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: PROS: -Fast shipping & item is just as described -Quality product CONS: -N/A

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toys! He loves the Avengers characters and plays with this toys all today.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette B.

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loved it!
customer_reviews.text: It was a birthday present for my 4-year-old grandson. He told me several times that it is a great present.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Harris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it and uses them to play in his toy house for the super heroes! They are also perfect size to carry along! Good quality!

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his toy!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves playing with these! Perfect gift for him. Can’t go wrong with these
customer_reviews.author: Melania

customer_reviews.title: Imaginext Avengers
customer_reviews.text: Totally awesome & fun. Can’t go wrong with Imaginext. Can’t go wrong with Avengers. Also... Captain America. Nuff said.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the tub
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for little boys or girls....they make EXCELLENT bath time toys. Perfect toy to help any child run wild with their imagination.

customer_reviews.title: Mini action figures
customer_reviews.text: Fun little min action figures for inside the large captains chest

customer_reviews.title: great addition to his collection
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES his guys, great addition to his collection.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty durable but my son prefers imaginnext best

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size. Wish it included better heroes.
customer_reviews.text: The perfect size for my son. He keeps them in his pocket. His favorites are Iron Man, Black Panther, and Captain America. Ant-Man is cool too. However, I wish this set included more prominent heroes like Hulk, Thor, and Spider Man.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Castellano

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Two of the action figures lost there heads before they were out of box. He is three he wanted his toy so I had to hot glue them. By the imaginext!

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable, actually purchased for my preschool block center.

customer_reviews.text: Great set. My boys love them and want more characters.

customer_reviews.title: Great

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift for a little boy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gift for a little boy! Made if durable and good quality material. Very Happy with my purchase :)

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these characters. They have held up well to rough preschool play!

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase & the store it came from
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my 6 year old son. They were delivered within 2 days. Very happy with my purchase & the store it came from. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: and this set did not disappoint. I wish they were a little more pose ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these figures, and this set did not disappoint. I wish they were a little more pose able, but again this is for him not me.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for little hands
customer_reviews.text: My 20 month old loves these. He even get to play super heroes with his big bro.

customer_reviews.title: Makes great bath toys

customer_reviews.title: Hero’s paint looks great thanks
customer_reviews.text: The hero’s paint looks great thanks! Our son will love them for his bday!

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely dissatisfied with these upon opening the package three of the figures heads came off. One is actually broken off . Much to the disappointment of my 3 year old grandson.

customer_reviews.title: perfect toys for little boys 😊

customer_reviews.title: Tough and baby-  to-  teenager friendly.

customer_reviews.text: Cute little action figures for small hands. They arrived on time and undamaged. My 2 year old absolutely loves them!

customer_reviews.title: so that is a big plus for little hands and most super heroes don't stand well
customer_reviews.text: Keeping these at my house for my 2 and 4 year old grandsons for their play with blocks, cars etc. They stand well, so that is a big plus for little hands and most super heroes don't stand well!

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids who like playing with the super hero’s
customer_reviews.text: As is! Great for kids who like playing with the super hero’s

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old loves them
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son loves these. Only have had a few days so cannot comment on how durable they are yet.

customer_reviews.title: Love the little Super Hero figures
customer_reviews.text: These items were perfect for the band's Super Hero basket sold at the silent auction fund raiser. Perfect size for little hands.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my son!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 2 year old. He loves playing with these and all his other “guys”. Ant man’s head did come off as soon as we got it but I super glued it back on and it works fine. No other issues
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: No more substitutes
customer_reviews.text: One of my son's was using other toys for 4 of the 6 heros in this pack so when I saw that I could get Black Panther, Hawkeye, Falcon and Antman (as well as duplicates of Capt. America and Iron Man) I had to pull the trigger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Price Was Good. and a 3 Year old got his Ant-man ...
customer_reviews.text: Came Quickly and Exactly as Imaged . Price Was Good. and a 3 Year old got his Ant-man Hawkeye and Black Panther That are So Hard to Find. Thank You. No complaints at alll

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Awesome toys for imaginary minds...my son drools over these mini figures!

customer_reviews.title: big bummer
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to using these on my son's birthday cake but we never got it.

customer_reviews.title: Playskool Heroes
customer_reviews.text: My sons love these heroes toys. They have many of these little heroes already, and various vehicles and play sets.They were really excited to get these characters.

customer_reviews.title: Decent toy
customer_reviews.text: Toys are decent. Pretty small and not many features. My 3 year old got bored with them within a few minutes.

customer_reviews.title: Don't judge by the packaging
customer_reviews.text: The packaging wasn't great, but my two grand boys LOVED this present. Each figure has his very own weapon. Cool!!

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: A good set to help expand your character roster. Some hard to find guys in a multipack is always a good deal!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are soooo cute the grand kiddie love them! A++

customer_reviews.title: They are solid and great for play
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our 3 year old for Christmas. He loves them! They are solid and great for play.

customer_reviews.title: Great set!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the set. Arms and legs move so that’s a plus. I only wish you guys had some of the other avengers. For example looking for a hulk in the same size.

customer_reviews.title: Really small toys!
customer_reviews.text: Cute little toys but super tiny! Way too expensive for that size!

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and poor quality

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift

customer_reviews.title: Make great cake toppers

product_meta.title: Playskool Heroes Super Hero Adventures Captain America Super Jungle Squad
product_meta.description: Little heroes can pretend to save the day with some of their favorite Marvel Super Hero figures! Captain America's Super Jungle Squad includes Captain America, Iron Man, Ant-Man, Marvel's Falcon, Black Panther, and Marvel's Hawkeye figures. Little ones can imagine daring missions and awesome match-ups. Collect them all for more adventures! Marvel products are produced by Hasbro under license from Marvel Characters B.V. Hasbro, Playskool, and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
